page.title: 11 MORE SHOPS
page.content: We enjoyed visiting a modern butcher's shop in a 200 year old building with 16 people working there. The raw carcases are sawn and chopped by hand like the mechanised model{butcher}in the window. They sell cooked meats and dairy produce as well. The smallest {grocer's}shop is 95 years old and has not been modernised.The 6 assistants sell cooked meats,delicatessen foods, fruit,vegetables,groceries and sweets. One of our{draper's}shops employs 20 people and is about 100 years old with old-fashioned windows.Their range of goods is carpets,materials and clothes for babies,ladies and young children. They sell lovely hats decorated with veils, feathers and artificial fruits. Most shops open from 8.30am to 5pm and close at 1pm on Thursday and all day Sunday.2{supermarkets}are out of town and we call them cash and carries.
